title: Veo 3 Fast and new image-to-video capabilities
summary: Google introduces Veo 3 Fast, an optimized model for speed and price, along with new image-to-video capabilities for both Veo 3 and Veo 3 Fast, enabling developers to efficiently create high-quality video content from text or still images, with varying pricing based on the model and audio inclusion,...
content: Google introduces Veo 3 Fast, an optimized model for speed and price, along with new image-to-video capabilities for both Veo 3 and Veo 3 Fast, enabling developers to efficiently create high-quality video content from text or still images, with varying pricing based on the model and audio inclusion, now available in the Gemini API.
